entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening except north 60 km/h gusting to 80 over southern sections overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
